name: Amalgamia's Last Stand
description:
Amalgamia needs to save her family from enemy androids!
                                              SAVE HERSELF FROM SOMETHING TERRIBLE

Join in on a large scale battle, similar to the classic  StarWars Battlefront 2 (2005), where you blast enemies with laser rifles and lead your army to victory!

THIS GAME ISN'T WHAT IT LOOKS LIKE! Amalgamia needs your help! Only YOU can save her!

Special thanks to JITENSHA03 for the SoundFX and Music!

This game is still under development, especially The Maze.
